fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this role is rolled, the host becomes a player with this role but without the first two sentences of this attribute.
Then, reroll this role to a random role from the Town. For the rest of the game, the host may:
> - Perform any abilities from their role, including ones gained externally.
> - Self-target once per game.
> - Be targeted and voted by other players.
> - Win, if the game ends in a Town victory.
- The host, however, may not:
> - Vote.
> - Give advice or send messages in day chat that may direct the Town in any way towards victory.
> - Act while everyone else is. The host must select who to use their action on *before* the phase formally begins.
- For the rest of the game, the host can be hanged. If they are, they die. They can still win from the grave, and are allowed to speak, but cannot perform actions. They still have to host though. This also applies if they die at night.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- It is publicly announced that this role spawned at the beginning of the game. The host does not count towards voting majority, as they cannot vote.
Abilities:
- Grant Invincible defense to a player at night. 1 night cooldown.
